resources.string: Imprimir Cupom
Deseja realmente imprimir o cupom da venda?
Sim, imprimir!

Erro ao Enviar dados de impressão!
A impressora não foi configurada!\n
Print head of printer is hot.\n
Motor Driver IC of printer is hot.\n
Battery of printer is hot.\n
Please wait until error LED of the printer turns off. \n
Please check the connection of the printer and the mobile terminal.\nConnection get lost.\n
Please close roll paper cover.\n
Please release a paper feed switch.\n
Please check roll paper.\n
Please set correct roll paper.\n
Please remove any jammed paper or foreign substances in the printer, and then turn the printer off and turn the printer on again.\n
Then, If the printer doesn\'t recover from error, please cycle the power switch.\n
Please cycle the power switch of the printer.\nIf same errors occurred even power cycled, the printer may out of order.
Please connect AC adapter or change the battery.\nBattery of printer is almost empty.\n
Roll paper is nearly end.\n
Battery level of printer is low.\n
Programming error: Parameter error has occurred.\n
Please check the connection of the printer and the mobile terminal.\nFailed to open communication port.\n
Por favor, reconecte a impressora ao terminal de vendas.\nFalha ao se comunicar com a impressora.\n
Please check the connection of the printer and the mobile terminal.\nCommunication has timed out.\n
Please close unnessesary applications.\nFree memory of the mobile terminal is insufficient.
Programming error: Some API was called improperly.\n
Programming error: Please wait until completion of current processing.\n
Programming error: Unsupported printer has selected.\n
Printer is offline.\n
Please check communication settings of the mobile terminal and application execution environment.\nUnknown error has occurred.\n
Please contact developer of this application.\nApplication error has occurred.\n
